title: MY SKINS ARE GONE AT THAT "LOOT AND CRAFTING SECTION"
body: I HAD SEVERAL SKINS THERE AND WHEN I CHECKED THEM THIS DAY THERE WAS ANYTHING PLEASE HELP!!!. and also some one send me link to some league of free skins and yeah.

replies.body: If you believe that your account was accessed by an unauthorized user, it's important to secure it and get access restored.  You can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help with that!  You can also reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can review this situation as well as look into possible repairs.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

THANK YOU!!! i really appreciate that you responsed but is there any possible way to me to get my account back?. i have been sending tickets and emails but i am getting desperate that am i gonna ever get it back :((((( please help...
